Uses of Class
com.sdklite.promise.Promise

    • Uses of Promise in com.sdklite.promise

      Methods in com.sdklite.promise that return Promise 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> Promise<T[]> Promise.all(Class<T> type, Iterable<?> args)
      Returns a single Promise that resolves when all of the promises in the iterable argument have resolved or when the iterable argument contains no promises.
      static <T> Promise<T[]> Promise.all(Class<T> type, Object... iterable)
      Returns a single Promise that resolves when all of the promises in the array argument have resolved or when the array argument contains no promises.
      static Promise<Object[]> Promise.all(Iterable<?> iterable)
      Returns a single Promise that resolves when all of the promises in the iterable argument have resolved or when the iterable argument contains no promises.
      static Promise<Object[]> Promise.all(Object... iterable)
      Returns a single Promise that resolves when all of the promises in the array argument have resolved or when the array argument contains no promises.
      static <T> Promise<T> Promise.reject(Throwable reason)
      Returns a Promise object that is rejected with the given reason.
      static <T> Promise<T> Promise.resolve()
      Returns a Promise object that is resolved with null value
      static <T> Promise<T> Promise.resolve(T value)
      Returns a Promise object that is resolved with the specific value
      static <T> Promise<T> Promise.resolve(Thenable<T> thenable)
      Returns a Promise instance with the specified thenable
      default Promise<V> Thenable.then(Consumer<V> onFulfilled) 
      Promise<V> Thenable.then(Consumer<V> onFulfilled, Consumer<Throwable> onRejected) 
      Promise<V> Promise.then(Consumer<V> onFulfilled, Consumer<Throwable> onRejected) 
      default <R> Promise<R> Thenable.then(Function<V,R> onFulfilled) 
      <R> Promise<R> Thenable.then(Function<V,R> onFulfilled, Function<Throwable,R> onRejected) 
      <R> Promise<R> Promise.then(Function<V,R> onFulfilled, Function<Throwable,R> onRejected)
